problem.markdown: In case of a compressor, the isentropic efficiency is defined by (work done in actual process)/( work done in a reversible isentropic process). ( ) True (x) False. [explanation] It is the reciprocal [explanation]
problem.p: In case of a compressor, the isentropic efficiency is defined by (work done in actual process)/( work done in a reversible isentropic process).
